name: @debrief/shared-types
description: Shared types for Debrief ecosystem with constrained GeoJSON FeatureCollections

scripts.clean: rm -rf src/types/[!R]*.ts dist/* python-src/debrief/types/[!R]*.py python-src/debrief/schemas/*.json build/ *.egg-info/
scripts.clean:smart: [ ! -f src/types/featurecollection.ts ] || find schema schemas -newer src/types/featurecollection.ts -print -quit | grep -q . && pnpm clean || echo 'Skipping clean - no schema changes detected'
scripts.generate:ts: NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 mkdir -p src/types && (NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 npx json-schema-to-typescript schema/featurecollection.schema.json --cwd schema/ > src/types/featurecollection.ts & NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 npx json-schema-to-typescript schemas/TimeState.json --cwd schemas/ > src/types/timestate.ts & NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 npx json-schema-to-typescript schemas/ViewportState.json --cwd schemas/ > src/types/viewportstate.ts & NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 npx json-schema-to-typescript schemas/SelectionState.json --cwd schemas/ > src/types/selectionstate.ts & NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 npx json-schema-to-typescript schemas/EditorState.json --cwd schemas/ > src/types/editorstate.ts & NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 npx json-schema-to-typescript schemas/CurrentState.json --cwd schemas/ > src/types/currentstate.ts & wait) && pnpm generate:ts:post-process
scripts.generate:python: NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 mkdir -p python-src/debrief/types && (NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 quicktype -s schema schema/track.schema.json -o python-src/debrief/types/track.py --lang python --top-level TrackFeature & NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 quicktype -s schema schema/point.schema.json -o python-src/debrief/types/point.py --lang python --top-level PointFeature & NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 quicktype -s schema schema/annotation.schema.json -o python-src/debrief/types/annotation.py --lang python --top-level AnnotationFeature & NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 quicktype -s schema schema/featurecollection.schema.json -o python-src/debrief/types/featurecollection.py --lang python --top-level DebriefFeatureCollection & NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 quicktype -s schema schemas/TimeState.json -o python-src/debrief/types/TimeState.py --lang python --top-level TimeState & NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 quicktype -s schema schemas/ViewportState.json -o python-src/debrief/types/ViewportState.py --lang python --top-level ViewportState & NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 quicktype -s schema schemas/SelectionState.json -o python-src/debrief/types/SelectionState.py --lang python --top-level SelectionState & NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 quicktype -s schema schemas/EditorState.json -o python-src/debrief/types/EditorState.py --lang python --top-level EditorState & wait)
scripts.build:python-wheel:optional: python -m build --wheel --outdir dist/python/ || echo '⚠️ Python wheel build skipped (missing dependencies)'
scripts.build:dist: pnpm generate:types && mkdir -p dist && pnpm compile:ts
scripts.build: pnpm clean && pnpm build:dist && pnpm build:python-wheel
scripts.dev: npx concurrently "npx nodemon --watch schema --watch schemas --ext 'json' --exec 'pnpm generate:types'" "npx tsc --watch --preserveWatchOutput"
scripts.test: pnpm test:generated && pnpm test:validators && pnpm test:schemas
scripts.validate: pnpm build && pnpm test && pnpm lint

author: Debrief Team
